p:
Strategy impact and field properties can be combined as follows:
•
Self-limiting population suppression—Periodic releases of genetically engineered mosquitoes suppress population size followed by the elimination of the engineered insects at the cessation of releases.
•
Self-sustaining population suppression—Fewer periodic releases needed to suppress population sizes.
•
Self-limiting population replacement—Eliminates ability of the mosquitoes to transmit the virus.
•
Self-sustaining population replacement—Eliminates ability of the mosquito to transmit the virus.
